content:
From: David Blubaugh via Cl-isabelle-users <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
DOOM  by Id Software...     New Hackaday IO Project started that utilizes the DOOM source code to be verified and validated by the Isabelle HOL automated theorem prover and 

I am in the process of developing this concept into an online course for a major publisher, once I obtain the necessary blessings from Bethsada Studios..   
Please take a look at the most recently opened Hackaday IO project AND PLEASE PROVIDE either feedback or hate mail will be much appreciated.  The hyperlink address is the following:  
DOOM SOURCE CODE - SOFTWARE ARCHAEOLOGY- ISABELLE

|

|
|
| |
DOOM SOURCE CODE - SOFTWARE ARCHAEOLOGY- ISABELLE

Doom Video Game Source code being analyzed by the Isabelle HOL automated theorem prover. This is done to help de...

More is coming and that is a promise...  

Respectfully,

David Blubaugh ATR Associate
